title: Pear, Gorgonzola, and Walnut Flatbread

Toppings: 1 ripe but firm pear, thinly sliced

steps: Place flatbread on a baking sheet and brush with 1 tbsp olive oil.
Lay pear slices evenly over the flatbread.
Scatter Gorgonzola and walnuts on top.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese melts.
Toss arugula with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle balsamic glaze over, slice, and serve warm.
